page.title: 14RELIGION IN PAXFORD AREA
page.content: Paxford has a C.of E. church in which one service is held each Sunday and an unused Baptist chapel. Baptists and Roman Catholics may worship at Chipping Campden, Quakers at Broad Campden. 2 services are held at St. Eadburga's C.of E.,Ebrington every Sunday in summer and 1 service on winter Sundays.The tower has 6 bells which are rung on Sundays for matins, and there are 2 organists. Special services are held at Christmas, Palm Sunday, Mothering Sunday and at Harvest Festival. Christening, marriage and funeral sevices are held in both churches. Ebrington primary school children attend a short service each Friday. Parishioners are mainly elderly.The church collections are mostly covenanted. After funerals, burials take place in the churchyard.
